StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
* Currently working as QA engineer in "Inspira Technologies Pvt. Ltd."
* An ISTQB certified tester, Overall 1.11+ years of professional experience in both manual and automation Testing.
* Having good knowledge and hands on experience on Hybrid Framework.
* Having knowledge on Core Java.
* Possess effective oral and written communication skills and the ability to work either independently or in a team.
* Experience in Data driven Testing, Cross browser testing and Parallel Test execution using Selenium WebDriver, TestNG.
* Knowledge and Experienced in Mobile Automation tool like Appium.
* Knowledge in Cucumber framework Automation.
* Preparation of weekly and monthly status reports.
* Proficient in devising all the artifacts of testing such as Test Scenarios, Test Cases, Defect Reports and Test Summary
Report.

PositionHistory.Title: Jr.Testing Engineer
PositionHistory.Description:
Project: SKOPIC.
Client: Skopic inc.
Tools Used: Selenium WebDriver, Appium, Eclipse, maven, log4j, SVN.

Description:

   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~     f58584e1379465e401804435a0e176&sid=3810263223&AT=1580681851
2/2/20 23&18


Skopic Mission is to promote Knowledge Sharing and Real Matters in Local Communities. Skopic vision solves the critical
missing use case totally ignored by the clamored social media. It is a new paradigm to develop more informed, engaged and real time communities. Skopic develops local information network through community sourced clutter-free information.
It's a community app that emphasizes social learning through information sharing and knowledge networking rather than
people networking or personal matters most social applications thrive upon.
My designation is manual and selenium automation tester for software applications. The following are my major roles in our product to ensure the productivity and quality of the product.

Manual testing:
* Read all the documents and understand what need to be tested.
* Designing and developing test plan, test cases and generating test reports, defect reports and product Quality
Assurance documentation.
* Executing the Test Cases and Tracking Defects in JIRA.
* Communication with the Test Manager and Conducting Review Meetings within the Team.
* Looking on statistics of java melody, to know the behavior of user and database.
* Weekly send Android and iOS (Mobile, TV and watch) test result to test manager.

Selenium Java Automation Testing:
* Figuring out the number of test cases that can be automated partially or completely using selenium automation tool.
* Tested in operating systems like Windows and MAC computer.
* Execute Test cases in different platforms like Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome and Safari.
* Using Hybrid Framework to executing Test cases.
* Maven is using as Java Build Tool and SVN use as version controller

Cucumber Framework Automation Testing:
* Figuring out the number of test scenarios that can be used to define the Base class, Feature files, Step definition
classes and Test Runner class.
* Execute Test cases in different platforms like Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome and Safari.
* After execution, I used to read the test execution reports through HTML and json.


Appium:
* Basic knowledge on mobiles testing via automation using Appium software tool.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 79% of this job

Degree.Comments: UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Electronics/Telecommunication) from MLR Institute of Technology, Hyderabad in 2016
PG: PG Diploma (Electronics) from MLR Institute of technology, hyderabad in 2016
